scripts.apidoc: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn apidoc:extract && yarn apidoc:generate
scripts.apidoc:extract: yarn workspaces run apidoc:extract && node scripts/fix-extracted-api-files.js
scripts.apidoc:generate: api-documenter markdown -i docs -o docs/dist && cp scripts/gh-pages_config.yml docs/dist/_config.yml && node scripts/enhance-doc-index-md.js
scripts.clean: rimraf temp docs && yarn workspaces run clean
scripts.test: yarn --cwd packages/core build && yarn workspaces run test && yarn lint:examples
scripts.test:ci: yarn workspaces run test:ci && yarn lint:examples:ci
scripts.coverage: cd packages/core && yarn build && yarn coverage && cd ../giraffe && yarn coverage
scripts.coverage:ci: cd packages/core && yarn build && yarn coverage:ci && cd ../giraffe && yarn coverage:ci
